properties.description: Unique message identifier inside chat.
properties.name: message_id

properties.description: Unique identifier of a message thread to which the message belongs; for supergroups only
properties.name: message_thread_id

properties.description: Information about the direct messages chat topic that contains the message
properties.name: direct_messages_topic

properties.description: Unique identifier of the topic.
properties.name: topic_id

properties.description: Information about the user that created the topic.
properties.name: user

properties.description: Unique identifier for this user or bot.
properties.name: id

properties.description: True, if this user is a bot.
properties.name: is_bot

properties.description: User's or bot's first name.

properties.description: User's or bot's last name.

properties.description: User's or bot's username
